member.name: P:Enterprise.Logging.Options.LoggingConfigOptions.AddLogFilters
member.summary: A custom configuration delegate for configuring log filters (in code). It is recommended to use configuration (appSettings.json) over in code configuration.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Logging.Options.LoggingConfigOptions.CustomConfigureLogging
member.summary: Completely customize logging configuration. If this is provided, all the logging configuration defaults will not be configured.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Logging.Options.LoggingConfigOptions.ConfigureExtendedServices
member.summary: This is used internally in the logging configuration setup. It is an extension point that can be used to register additional services.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Logging.Providers.LoggingProviderConfigOptions.EnableConsole
member.summary: This is useful in local environments but also in cloud environments where console output is captured. Containerized applications will also have log output. https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/extensions/console-log-formatter

member.name: P:Enterprise.Logging.Providers.LoggingProviderConfigOptions.ConfigureProviders
member.summary: Configure the specific provider service(s) available for use in the application.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Logging.TraceListeners.TraceListenerConfigOptions.LogFileApplicationName
member.summary: The name of the application that is safe to use for file system operations. Folder names, file names, etc.
